quote: I really think a champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
author: Serena Williams

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The vision of a champion is someone who is bent over, drenched in sweat, at the point of exhaustion, when nobody else is watching.
author: Mia Hamm
team: Former U.S. Women's National Soccer Team

quote: I'd rather regret the risks that didn't work out than the chances I didn't take at all.
author: Simone Biles

quote: Just go out there and do what you have to do.
author: Martina Navratilova

quote: There are no limits, no barriers to your success, you will be unstoppable.
author: Allyson Felix
team: U.S. Women's Track and Field Team

quote: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
team: Former U.S. Women's Track and Field Team

quote: To be the best, you have to be able to handle the worst.
author: Ronda Rousey

quote: I've been told I have a natural talent, but talent only gets you so far.
author: Lisa Leslie

quote: When you fall, get right back up. Just keep going, keep pushing it.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: Work hard. Dream big.
author: Diana Taurasi

quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
author: Venus Williams

quote: I've never scored a goal in my life without getting a pass from someone else.
author: Abby Wambach
team: Former U.S. Women's National Soccer Team

quote: Hard days are the best because that's when champions are made.
author: Gabby Douglas

quote: True champions aren't always the ones that win, but those with the most guts.
author: Hope Solo
team: Former U.S. Women's National Soccer Team

quote: I drive, I race, I win. I try to win as much as I can.
author: Danica Patrick

quote: The triumph can't be had without the struggle.
author: Wilma Rudolph
team: Former U.S. Women's Track and Field Team

quote: Pressure is a privilege.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Find what you love and let it kill you.
author: Chris Evert

quote: Hard work has made it easy. That is my secret. That is why I win.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: I push myself to be the best I can be. I don't worry about what other people are doing, and I don't waste time looking over my shoulder.
author: Annika SÃ¶renstam

quote: It's not all about winning. Sometimes it's simply about enjoying and appreciating the journey.
author: Yuna Kim

quote: You don't always get what you wish for. But you do always get what you work for.
author: Michelle Kwan

quote: You got to try and reach for the stars or try and achieve the unreachable.
author: Cathy Freeman
team: Former Australian Track and Field Team

quote: I'm not the next anyone, I'm the first Maria Sharapova.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Lindsey Horan

quote: The more matches you play, the more confident you are and the more confident you feel.
author: Caroline Wozniacki

quote: Keep working even when no one is watching.
author: Alex Morgan
team: Former U.S. Women's National Soccer Team

quote: It's the trials and tribulations that make you stronger.
author: Katie Ledecky

quote: You have to love what you do to want to do it every day.
author: Jordyn Wieber

quote: Always believe that you can make it.
author: Simona Halep

quote: Success doesn't come overnight. Keep your eye on the prize and don't look back.
author: Carli Lloyd
team: Former U.S. Women's National Soccer Team

quote: If you don't get the results you want, change your approach, not the goal.
author: Ashleigh Barty

quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
author: Sloane Stephens

quote: Anything is possible if you believe in yourself.
author: Tori Bowie
team: U.S. Women's Track and Field Team

quote: Don't let the obstacles determine where you go. Determine where you want to go and don't stop until you get there.
author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce

quote: There's no magic to running far or climbing Everest. Endurance is mental strength. It's all about heart.
author: Allyson Felix
team: U.S. Women's Track and Field Team

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
author: Dorothy Hamill

quote: Winning doesn't always mean being first. Winning means you're doing better than you've ever done before.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: Success doesn't happen overnight. Keep your eye on the prize and don't look back.
author: Megan Rapinoe
team: Former U.S. Women's National Soccer Team

quote: No one is easy. You have to fight for what you want.
author: Ronda Rousey

quote: You don't play for the crowd. You play for the country.
author: Naomi Osaka

quote: If you believe and work hard, your dreams can come true.
author: Katie Taylor

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Dawn Staley

quote: We have to be our number one fan before anyone else can be.
author: Misty May-Treanor
team: Former U.S. Women's Beach Volleyball Team

quote: You have to know what sparks the light in you so that you, in your own way, can illuminate the world.
author: Laila Ali

quote: You can't always be the strongest or most talented. But you can be the most determined.
author: Paula Radcliffe

quote: The only one who can tell you "you can't" is you. And you don't have to listen.
author: Jessica Ennis-Hill
team: Former British Track and Field Team

quote: Life is full of what-ifs. You can't let it control you.
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: You can always get better.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I want to win. I want to be the best.
author: Danica Patrick

quote: No matter what accomplishments you make, somebody helped you.
author: Althea Gibson

quote: You have to believe in the long-term plan you have but you need the short-term goals to motivate and inspire you.
author: Kim Clijsters

quote: You've got to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive set, confidence is the difference.
author: Ann Meyers

quote: Believe me, the reward is not so great without the struggle.
author: Wilma Rudolph
team: Former U.S. Women's Track and Field Team

quote: It's important to push yourself further than you think you can go each and every day - as that is what separates the good from the great.
author: Shannon Miller

quote: Failure I can live with. Not trying is what I can't handle!
author: Sanya Richards-Ross
team: U.S. Women's Track and Field Team
